items.title: Multipurpose House for VR
items.summary: Hello world! I created the multipurpose house in Second Life for you. It is full of stuff which is free for you, but many things inside I bought. This website will list all the changes I do to the house through the years, since 2020.
items.content_html:
Hello world!

I created the multipurpose house in Second Life for you. It is full of stuff which is free for you, but many things inside I bought. This website will list all the changes I do to the house through the years, since 2020.

In 2019 the second version of the house was sent. Every new version of the house contains previous items and some new added

Changes made since January 2020

01/2020

The script changed for doors. Now it stays open. The script is full perm and I got it for 150 L. It allows to lock the house for a list of users or for a group
